optionTitle.message: Settings and Operation Method(Twitter UI Customizer)

optionHeading2.message: How to operate Twitter UI Customizer

optionContent2_1.message: Change the settings from the URL above.

optionContent2_3.message: The Restore Defaults button allows you to restore the default settings for this extension.

optionContent2_4.message: *The default for this extension is based on the design before the design change on 2021/8/12 JST.
